solution_line_template: There are 3 times as many green balls as blue balls so green balls = blue balls * 3. Green balls = {blue_balls} blue balls * {green_multiplier} = <<{blue_balls}*{green_multiplier}={green_balls}>>{green_balls} green balls

There are 2 times as many yellow balls as red ones so yellow balls = red balls * 2. Yellow balls = {red_balls} red balls * {yellow_multiplier} = <<{red_balls}*{yellow_multiplier}={yellow_balls}>>{yellow_balls} yellow balls

The total number of all the balls is 6 blue + 4 red + 18 green + 8 yellow: {blue_balls}+{red_balls}+{green_balls}+{yellow_balls} = <<{blue_balls}+{red_balls}+{green_balls}+{yellow_balls}={total_balls}>>{total_balls} balls
